troubleshooting.label: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Various ways in which a print could fail and how to remedy them using Cura settings.

layer_shift.label: Layer Shift
layer_shift.description: Layers are not properly stacked on top of each other.

stringing.label: Stringing
stringing.description: There are strings of plastic in places where the nozzle travels from one place to another.

underextrusion.label: Underextrusion
underextrusion.description: The printer is not extrusing enough material to make a strong, solid object.

warping.label: Warping
warping.description: The print curls up due to shrinkage when it cools down.

preferences.label: Preferences
preferences.description: Adjust the behaviour of this plug-in.

contributors.label: Contributors
contributors.description: Everyone that helped in creating this plug-in.
